page.title: 13SURVEYS
page.content: {GAME POPULARITY SURVEY The votes cast by the children were as follows: Football 19 Rounders 18 Snooker 8 Darts 3 Donkey 3 Cricket 2 Elastic 2 Squash 2 Netball 2 {LEISURE AND RECREATION SURVEY A survey on children's favourite leisure and recreational activities was conducted amongst children in Classes 1 and 2 at Beaupre Community Primary School Outwell on June 5th 1985. The most popular activity was football, whilst the least popular was card playing. The votes cast were as follows: Football 20 Discos 17 Snooker 13 Swimming 9 Fishing 8 Pool 8 Youth Club5 Watching TV4 Reading 4 Darts 3 Running 3 Biking 2 Card playing 1
